backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no state or methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature mapping file listing UI/UX improvements, related source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH theme tokens, dark mode values, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing the root mount element and script reference for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React page rendering the profile card, share button, social actions, link filtering, URL safety checks, and toasts.
frontend/src/components/ProfileActionBut: Reusable stylized action button with icon alignment and optional external link handling.
frontend/src/components/Toast.tsx: Custom toast system with success/error notifications, auto-dismiss, and listener registry.
frontend/src/features/profile/profileTyp: Type definitions for profile data and default profile with updated bio and Snapchat link.
frontend/src/features/profile/useProfile: Hook managing stored profile data with migrations for Snapchat, email, bio, and link cleanup.
frontend/src/features/profile/validation: Validation helpers for URLs, emails, phone sanitization, and safe mailto link creation.
frontend/src/features/share/useCopyToCli: Provides a hook to copy text to the clipboard using modern API with a fallback and exposes copy errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth context and provider handling login, stored identity restoration, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file since no backend queries exist and data is stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode values, and utility animations for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radius, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, requirements, and image improvement instructions.
